rules: Rule1: If Alice has the skill of programming, then she has the skill of debugging.
Rule2: Whenever Alice is assigned to project Z, she is also assigned to project X.

Rule3: Given that Alice has the skill of cloud computing, if she has the skill of DevOps, then she works in the operations department or, provided she has the skill of testing, she does not work in the marketing department.
Rule4: If Alice is assigned to client A, then she is assigned to client B.
Rule5: In the case that Alice is assigned to client B, she is assigned to project X.

Rule6: Either Alice uses the tool version control or, if it is not the case that not having the skill of debugging implies she is productive, then she has the skill of documentation, which implies she does not use the tool IDE.
Rule7: Provided that Alice works in the development department, she does not work in the marketing department.
Rule8: If Alice is assigned to project X, then she is productive.
Rule9: In the event that Alice is assigned to project Y, she is also assigned to project X.
Rule10: Alice is assigned to project Y or she is assigned to project Z.
Rule11: If it is not the case that using the tool testing framework implies not using the tool IDE, then Alice uses the tool deployment tool.
Rule12: Should it not be the case that not having the skill of debugging implies being productive, and that implies having the skill of documentation, then Alice uses the tool testing framework.
Rule13: Provided that it is not the case that not having the skill of debugging implies being productive, and that implies having the skill of documentation, then Alice uses the tool IDE.
Rule14: If Alice is not productive, then she works in the marketing department.
facts: Fact1: Alice has the skill of programming.
Fact2: Alice has the skill of testing.
Fact3: Alice has the skill of DevOps.
Fact4: Alice has the skill of cloud computing.
Fact5: Alice is assigned to client A.
Fact6: Alice works in the development department.
Fact7: It is not the case that Alice uses the tool deployment tool.
Fact8: It is not the case that Alice works in the operations department.
Fact9: It is not the case that Alice has the skill of documentation.
Fact10: It is not the case that Alice uses the tool version control.
